title: Master of the Craft
bio: Based in Rochester, NY, I specialize in high-contrast blackwork tattoos that push the boundaries of light and shadow. My bold, dramatic style creates striking pieces that make a statement.
fullBio: My journey into tattooing began a couple years ago in Rochester, NY, where I discovered my passion for high-contrast artwork. I specialize in creating bold, dramatic pieces that play with light and shadow to create depth and impact. My signature style focuses on strong blacks and negative space, creating tattoos that are both timeless and contemporary. Each piece is carefully crafted to complement the body's natural lines while making a powerful visual statement.
